name: Architect
description: People with the Architect personality type focus much of their energy on strategy and getting things done well.
suggested_starting_place: Personality Type and Love Language: Architects (INTJ).

name: Logician
description: Logicians are more likely than other personality types to report that they struggle with trust, sacrifice, giving, and belonging.
suggested_starting_place: 11 Ways Turbulent Introverts Can Build Confidence and Sociability.

name: Commander
description: Commanders see themselves as less sensitive than most other personality types to other people’s needs and feelings.
suggested_starting_place: Asking for Help Part II: Some Stories Personality Types Tell Themselves.

name: Debater
description: Debaters are often in a state of flux and uncertainty.
suggested_starting_place: Putting It Off No More: Procrastination and Personality.

name: Advocate
description: Advocates are generally concerned with ensuring that people are all right and treated fairly.
suggested_starting_place: What Are the Biggest Sources of Stress for Advocates (INFJs)?

name: Mediator
description: Mediators are sensitive, warm people who care about others.
suggested_starting_place: Mediators (INFP) and Self-Talk: Transforming Negativity into Creative Opportunities.

name: Protagonist
description: Protagonists are protectors. They care about the welfare of others.
suggested_starting_place: “I Don’t Want to Hear It”: Compassion Fatigue and Feeling Personality Types.

name: Campaigner
description: Campaigners are more likely than most personalities to desire opportunities to be spontaneous, explore novelty, and follow their feelings.
suggested_starting_place: Campaigner (ENFP) Productivity Tips: Results and Relationships.

name: Logistician
description: Logisticians like things to be orderly and reasonable. They have little tolerance for things being disorganized or, in their opinion, nonsensical.
suggested_starting_place: Understanding Forgiveness through the Lens of Personality Type.

name: Defender
description: Defenders are detail-oriented and exacting, mostly of themselves.
suggested_starting_place: Defenders (ISFJ) and Mental Load: Holding It All Together.

name: Executive
description: Executives are vigorously hands-on in life, whether accomplishing a task themselves or leading others.
suggested_starting_place: Personality Types, Emotional Intelligence (EQ), and the Workplace.

name: Consul
description: It’s too easy to think of Consuls as the creators of celebrations and the reliable ones in any group.
suggested_starting_place: “I’m Not Stubborn, I’m Persistent”: Stubbornness and Personality Types.

name: Virtuoso
description: Virtuosos are the quiet doers. They place a lot of value on the things that allow them to feel proficient.
suggested_starting_place: Is It Okay to Be an Unsociable Personality?

name: Adventurer
description: Adventurers tend to be humble and sensitive individuals.
suggested_starting_place: Finding Your Life Purpose If You’re an Explorer.

name: Entrepreneur
description: If Entrepreneurs are nearby, hang on to your metaphorical hat.
suggested_starting_place: Prospecting Personality Types: Adulting Superpowers and Projects.

name: Entertainer
description: Life is a cabaret, or so the old song says. Entertainers likely agree.
suggested_starting_place: Building Financial Literacy According to Personality Type.
